document_data.name: Assist
document_data.mainbody: '''''Assist''''' was a [[necromancy]]/[[conjuration]] [[spell]] that increased the heartiness of a specific person.
document_data.Effects: This spell functioned in a similar manner to the version of the [[divine]] spell ''[[aid]]'', but did not affect the morale of the recipient.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell had the [[material component]] of a small amount of strong-smelling [[herb]]s. The recipient was required to inhale their odor for the spell to take effect.
